verses.verse: וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> there arose אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> And after אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech לְהוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> to defend אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel תּוֹלָ֧ע <WH8439> Tola בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פּוּאָ֛ה <WH6312> of Puah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <WH1734> of Dodo אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a man יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> of Issachar וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> and he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> and he dwelt בְּשָׁמִ֖יר <WH8069> in Shamir בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim

וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <WH8199> And he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <WH7969> and three שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> and died וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּשָׁמִֽיר׃ <WH8069> in Shamir פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> him arose אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> And after יָאִ֖יר <WH2971> Jair הַגִּלְעָדִ֑י <WH1569> a Gileadite וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <WH8199> and judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> and two שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֞וֹ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> sons רֹֽכְבִים֙ <WH7392> that rode עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> on thirty עֲיָרִ֔ים <WH5895> ass colts וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and they had thirty עֲיָרִ֖ים <WH5895> donkeys לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like לָהֶ֞ם <WH1992> that יִקְרְא֣וּ ׀ <WH7121> which are called חַוֹּ֣ת יָאִ֗יר <WH2334> Havothjair עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> it בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> which [are] in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead
וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died יָאִ֔יר <WH2971> And Jair וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּקָמֽוֹן׃ <WH7056> in Camon פ

וַיֹּסִ֣פוּ ׀ <WH3254> again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> did הָרַע֮ <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֣וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִ֣ים <WH1168> Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעַשְׁתָּר֡וֹת <WH6252> and Ashtaroth וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the gods אֲרָם֩ <WH758> of Syria וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> and the gods צִיד֜וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the gods מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> of Moab וְאֵת֙ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the gods בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the gods פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיַּעַזְב֥וּ <WH5800> and forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not עֲבָדֽוּהוּ׃ <WH5647> and served

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was hot אַ֥ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵם֙ <WH4376> and he sold בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּבְיַ֖ד <WH3027> and into the hands בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַֽיִּרְעֲצ֤וּ <WH7492> they vexed וַיְרֹֽצְצוּ֙ <WH7533> and oppressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> And that year הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> they all בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בַּגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> which [is] in Gilead

וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <WH5674> passed over בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Moreover the children עַמּוֹן֙ <WH5983> of Ammon אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan לְהִלָּחֵ֛ם <WH3898> to fight גַּם־ <WH1571> also בִּיהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> also against Judah וּבְבִנְיָמִ֖ין <WH1144> and against Benjamin וּבְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> and against the house אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וַתֵּ֥צֶר <WH3334> distressed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> so that Israel מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> was sore

וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> cried בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying חָטָ֣אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned לָ֔ךְ וְכִ֤י <WH3588> for עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <WH5800> against thee both because we have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> and also served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> Baalim פ

וַ֥יֹּאמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> [Did] not [I deliver you] from the Egyptians וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> and from the Amorites וּמִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּמִן־ <WH4480> at פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> Philistine

וְצִידוֹנִ֤ים <WH6722> The Zidonians וַֽעֲמָלֵק֙ <WH6002> also and the Amalekites וּמָע֔וֹן <WH4584> and the Maonites לָחֲצ֖וּ <WH3905> did oppress אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וַתִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> you and ye cried אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to וָאוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <WH3467> to me and I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> you out of their hand

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <WH5800> Yet ye have forsaken אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַתַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other לָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> therefore לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no אוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> you no more לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> wherefore I will deliver אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> Go וְזַֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> and cry אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH977> which ye have chosen בָּ֑ם הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> let them יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <WH3467> deliver לָכֶ֖ם בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> you in the time צָרַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH6869> of your tribulation

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD חָטָ֔אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned עֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> do אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you לָ֔נוּ כְּכָל־ <WH3605> whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> thou unto us whatsoever seemeth אַ֛ךְ <WH389> only הַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <WH5337> unto thee deliver נָ֖א <WH4994> please הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> us only we pray thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיָּסִ֜ירוּ <WH5493> And they put away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> the strange מִקִּרְבָּ֔ם <WH7130> from among וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> them and served אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> was grieved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> and his soul בַּעֲמַ֥ל <WH5999> for the misery יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיִּצָּֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH6817> were gathered together בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Then the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בַּגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> in Gilead וַיֵּאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> assembled themselves together בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> in Mizpeh

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> And the people שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> [and] princes גִלְעָד֙ <WH1568> of Gilead אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> to another מִ֣י <WH4310> Who הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> What man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יָחֵ֔ל <WH2490> [is he] that will begin לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> Ammon יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לְרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> head לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead פ
